name: Communication
purpose: Show others that we can help them

name: Speaker
purpose: Physically expose our purpose to a larger audience to raise awareness about our mission
accountabilities: Finding relevant topics for wicked problems we're trying to solve
Discovering speaking opportunities at meetups and conferences

name: Communication steward
purpose: Show the world what we do and care about by sharing inspiration from inside the rocket
accountabilities: Identifying topics worth sharing with the outside world (through articles, newsletters, social media posts, ...)
Gathering content input/inspirations from other crew members
Planning, producing and/or coordinating content (visual and textual)
Evaluating other crew members' content proposals and helping them produce content
Reflecting on existing communication channels to expose our signals
